description.value:
Your mech can fire a healing beam, restoring @Damage[(floor(@actor.level/2))d8[healing]] Hit Points to all creatures within a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. Affected creatures then gain partial immunity to this ability; for the next 10 minutes, instead of healing those creatures, this ability grants them half as many temporary Hit Points for 1 round.

Overcharge Function You put ever more power into your heal beam's energy, though you risk overstressing the projector. Add the amp and overcharge traits to Heal Beam. The area becomes a @Template[type:cone|distance:60], and the healing increases to d10s. You cannot add the effects of more than one Beam overcharge function to a single use of a beam.

Level (+2) Increase the healing by 1d6.
